technologies_to_launch_our_clients_into_: technologies to launch our clients into the future
NDUK_is_a_digital: NDUK is a digital consulting firm that provides integrated blockchain solutions. We operate in three key areas:
we_are_specialists: We are specialists when it comes to de-centralized finance & banking solutions. NDUK has helped clients involved in bitcoin mining with business design and has implemented risk management controls, forecasting tools and algorithmic hedging solutions. We are also technical experts in payment systems infrastructure, both in traditional finance as well in distributed ledger applications.
We_help_our: We help our clients unlock their true potential by implementing custom and client-specific software to help them extract value from their businesses. Our team of technical experts have extensive experience in data analytics, AI, machine learning, blockchain and distributed ledger technologies.
extensive_experience: NDUK has extensive experience in the cryptocurrency mining & infrastructure space. When it comes to starting or even expanding mining operations, NDUK can help your business deliver on the entire project - from proof of concept, initiation and planning all the way to execution and performance monitoring using our in-house state-of-the-art technology solutions.
we_offer: We offer a range of services from strategic advisory and assisted prototyping right through to the delivery of production-ready enterprise solutions. Below, we've rounded up some examples of our blockchain solutions for past clients' needs. For a more exhaustive list, visit our
services1contnet: NDUK has produced a fully operational OMS (Order Management System); this front to back solution was developed for an investment manager working with crypto assets.
services1contnetPart2: This solution was fully customized for the client’s needs. We have integrated customisable & client specific execution algorithms with several Crypto Exchanges, prepared MI dashboards for risk management and deployed an end-to-end database for back testing their strategies. Our solution enabled our client to optimise their capital allocation within the cryptocurrency space, using a quantitative, rules based and automated approach.
services2contnet: NDUK has been commissioned to build a blockchain based inventory management solution for a US based physical trader in fuel products. Blockchain technology can vastly improve inventory management by recording transactions in a chronological order, enhancing traceability and reducing cost of verification. These solutions are transforming warehousing and supply chain operations across the Globe.
services3contnet: NDUK has extensive experience in the cryptocurrency mining & infrastructure space. When it comes to starting or even expanding mining operations, NDUK can help your business deliver on the entire project - from proof of concept, initiation and planning all the way to execution and performance monitoring using our in-house state-of-the-art technology solutions. NDUK has for example, developed an end-to-end 9 Megawatts Crypto Mining Operation.
services4contnet: Pioneered by Bitcoin, cryptocurrency transfer apps are exploding in popularity right now. Blockchain is especially popular in finance for the money and time it can save financial companies of all sizes.
services4contnetpart2: By eliminating bureaucratic red tape, making ledger systems real-time and reducing third-party fees, blockchain can save the largest banks $8-$12 billion a year, according to a recent article by ComputerWorld.
services5contnet: Smart contracts are like regular contracts except the rules of the contract are enforced in real-time on a blockchain, which eliminates the middleman and adds levels of accountability for all parties involved in a way not possible with traditional agreements. This saves businesses time and money, while also ensuring compliance from everyone involved.
services5contnetpart2: Blockchain-based contracts are becoming more and more popular as sectors like government, healthcare and the real estate industry discover the benefits.
services6contnet: Many of the current problems in media deal with data privacy, royalty payments and piracy of intellectual property. According to a study by Deloitte, the digitization of media has caused widespread sharing of content that infringes on copyrights. Deloitte believes blockchain can give the industry a much needed facelift when it comes to data rights, piracy and payments.
services6contnetpart2: Blockchain’s strength in the media industry is its ability to prevent a digital asset, such as an mp3 file, from existing in multiple places. It can be shared and distributed while also preserving ownership, making piracy virtually impossible through a transparent ledger system. Additionally, blockchain can maintain data integrity, allowing advertising agencies to target the right customers, and musicians to receive proper royalties for original works.

Blockchain applications go: Blockchain applications go far beyond cryptocurrency and bitcoin; from cross-border payments, royalties tracking and advertising insights all the way to digital and real asset ownership verification, the technology is impacting a variety of sectors with its ability to create more transparency and fairness, while also saving businesses time and money.
We at NDUK bring: We at NDUK bring you the best in blockchain development services, combining technical prowess with extensive business experience to embrace the transformative nature of this space.
well_seasoned: With a well-seasoned team made up of global markets traders, technology specialists & quantitative analysts, we are here to make blockchain happen for you.
Nova Duvera is a Digital Consultancy: Nova Duvera is a Digital Consultancy built on a history of passion for Technological Innovation. We are here to give structure to your vision and have the means to make it happen.
